2025-0898
2025-12-05IRCC, GAC, TBFinancial Administration ActCertain Fees in Respect of the Issuance of Identity and Travel Documents (2025 Canada Wildfires) Remission OrderCertain Fees in Respect of the Issuance of Identity and Travel Documents (2025 Canada Wildfires) Remission Order in order to remit fees that were waived for Canadians and permanent residents affected by the 2025 Canada wildfires from April 1 to November 30, 2025.N/A
subject: Certain Fees in Respect of the Issuance of Identity and Travel Documents (2025 Canada Wildfires) Remission Order
precis: Certain Fees in Respect of the Issuance of Identity and Travel Documents (2025 Canada Wildfires) Remission Order in order to remit fees that were waived for Canadians and permanent residents affected by the 2025 Canada wildfires from April 1 to November 30, 2025.
